channel.title: 718 Anims
channel.description:
Hello, could someone give me the death, attack, defence anims of the next npc's :)
Giant Rock crab (2885) Armored Zombie (14339) Yaks (5529)
And does someone know how to edit their drops?
And in settings.javs is my drop rate 10.
Is 100 making the chance for rares bigger or lower?
Thanks if anyone could help :)
